×3\" (A shout of rebuke/shouting 'No!')"},{"lineNumber":122796,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の保育園に","translatedEnglishLine":"At the daycare center of Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":122797,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫と３Ｇが遊びに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Kaori and 3G had come to play."},{"lineNumber":122798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「べろべろべろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bero bero bero\" (Sounds of sticking out tongue)"},{"lineNumber":122799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U~...\" (Groaning or whining sound)"},{"lineNumber":122800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばあああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Baaa!\" (Peekaboo or playful sound)"},{"lineNumber":122801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U~...\" (Again a groan or whimper)"},{"lineNumber":122802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっぷっぷー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Appuppu~\" (Playful teasing sound)"},{"lineNumber":122803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっきゃっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyakya...\" (Giggling or laughter)"},{"lineNumber":122804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ、なんとも元気な子じゃ×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, what lively children these are! ×3\""},{"lineNumber":122805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この部屋には客がよく訪れるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Many guests often come to this room, but...\""},{"lineNumber":122806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さすが年の功、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As expected from experience,"},{"lineNumber":122807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　子の世話は３Ｇ殿が一番上手いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"3G is the best at taking care of children.\""},{"lineNumber":122808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほほ、慣れてるだけです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, I’m just used to it.\""},{"lineNumber":122809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このまま私と一緒に保育士を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’d even like you to work as a daycare worker alongside me\""},{"lineNumber":122810,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やって頂きたいくらいです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"just like this.\""},{"lineNumber":122811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ、それもいいですな×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, that would be nice too! ×3\""},{"lineNumber":122812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「デレデレだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re getting all lovey-dovey.\""},{"lineNumber":122813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、３Ｇは子供好きですから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, 3G likes children.\""},{"lineNumber":122814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":122815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセットー、こっち来いー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset, come here!\""},{"lineNumber":122816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーにー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":122817,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットがむぎゅっとランスの足に抱きつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset hugged tightly onto Rance’s leg."},{"lineNumber":122818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「３Ｇと仲いいな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re close with 3G, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":122819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、いーよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it’s fine!\""},{"lineNumber":122820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつ、子供を食うぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That guy eats children!\""},{"lineNumber":122821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":122822,"originalJapaneseLine":"パッとリセットが３Ｇを見る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset suddenly looked at 3G."},{"lineNumber":122823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U...\" (sound of hesitation)"},{"lineNumber":122824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うそだよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m lying...\""},{"lineNumber":122825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そんなことしないよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I wouldn’t do something like that, would I?\""},{"lineNumber":122826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……やはり気づいてなかったか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... So you hadn’t noticed after all...\""},{"lineNumber":122827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが奴の手なんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s his trick.\""},{"lineNumber":122828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気のいい老人のふりして近づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He pretends to be a kind old man and approaches,"},{"lineNumber":122829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　油断したところを捕獲する気だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"then captures you the moment you let your guard down.\""},{"lineNumber":122830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「夜になるとあの三つの顔が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When night falls, those three faces"},{"lineNumber":122831,"originalJapaneseLine":"　口をバクバク動かしてな、","translatedEnglishLine":"move their mouths open and close,"},{"lineNumber":122832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捕まえた子供に問いかけるのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and ask the children they’ve caught.\""},{"lineNumber":122833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんてぇ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":122834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「右の笑顔で手足からポキポキ食べようか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With the smiling face on the right, shall I snap off your arms and legs and eat them?"},{"lineNumber":122835,"originalJapaneseLine":"　左の泣き顔でお腹をズルズル食べようか？","translatedEnglishLine":"With the crying face on the left, shall I gobble up your belly?"},{"lineNumber":122836,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中の怒り顔で頭からバリバリ食べようか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"And with the angry face in the middle, shall I crunch into your head?\""},{"lineNumber":122837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それとも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or...\""},{"lineNumber":122838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":122839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それとも……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or...?\""},{"lineNumber":122840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「三つの口で体中を噛み砕いてくれようか〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall the three mouths chew and crush your entire body~!\""},{"lineNumber":122841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":122842,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットはジッとランスの顔を見上げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset stared quietly up at Rance’s face."},{"lineNumber":122843,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あれ？　固まっちまった？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Huh? Did he freeze up?)"},{"lineNumber":122844,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":122845,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぴゃっ、とリセットはランスから離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Reset pulled away from Rance."},{"lineNumber":122846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あら？　リセットちゃん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, oh? Reset-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":122847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":122848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おやおや、どうかされましたかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, is something the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":122849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが……抱きついたまま何も言わなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... she hugged me but hasn't said anything...\""},{"lineNumber":122850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂の目が黒い内はそれだけは許しませんぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as my eyes are dark, I will never allow that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それを決めるのは香ちゃんなのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one to decide that is Kaori-chan!"
At the daycare center of Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫と３Ｇが遊びに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Kaori and 3G had come to play.
"Bero bero bero" (Sounds of sticking out tongue)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ、なんとも元気な子じゃ×３」
「この部屋には客がよく訪れるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Many guests often come to this room, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子の世話は３Ｇ殿が一番上手いな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 3G is the best at taking care of children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このまま私と一緒に保育士を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’d even like you to work as a daycare worker alongside me"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やって頂きたいくらいです」
「ほっほっほっ、それもいいですな×３」
リセットがむぎゅっとランスの足に抱きつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset hugged tightly onto Rance’s leg.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パッとリセットが３Ｇを見る。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I wouldn’t do something like that, would I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……やはり気づいてなかったか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... So you hadn’t noticed after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気のいい老人のふりして近づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He pretends to be a kind old man and approaches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 油断したところを捕獲する気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then captures you the moment you let your guard down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「夜になるとあの三つの顔が
口をバクバク動かしてな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: move their mouths open and close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まえた子供に問いかけるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ask the children they’ve caught."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「右の笑顔で手足からポキポキ食べようか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With the smiling face on the right, shall I snap off your arms and legs and eat them?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左の泣き顔でお腹をズルズル食べようか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the crying face on the left, shall I gobble up your belly?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中の怒り顔で頭からバリバリ食べようか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with the angry face in the middle, shall I crunch into your head?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三つの口で体中を噛み砕いてくれようか〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall the three mouths chew and crush your entire body~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットはジッとランスの顔を見上げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset stared quietly up at Rance’s face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぴゃっ、とリセットはランスから離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Reset pulled away from Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あら？　リセットちゃん？」
「おやおや、どうかされましたかな？」
「それが……抱きついたまま何も言わなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... she hugged me but hasn't said anything..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
